page.title: 06Farming Pollard Farm
page.content: There are three farms but Pollard is the one that we went to.There are three brothers in partnership.Pollard farm is the one that handles the cows.They have sixty six milking cows and four nursing cows.Nursing cows are used for feeding the calves.The nursing cows stay in a stable with some of the calves.It takes fifty acres of grass to fill up the silage shed.All the cows have different names.The Curnows have a lot of machinery including two combine harvesters.One of them belongs to Mr. Curnows brother who is an agricultural contracter.His combine is green, and Mr.Curnows is red.The Curnows grow corn,potatoes,and wheat.
